scripts.benchmark: cd ../.. && ./node_modules/.bin/spago build -p yoga-om-strom && ./node_modules/.bin/purs-backend-es build --output-dir output-es && node -e "import('./output-es/Main/index.js').then(m => m.main())"
scripts.minibench:node: cd ../.. && ./node_modules/.bin/spago build -p yoga-om-strom --ensure-ranges && ./node_modules/.bin/purs-backend-es build --output-dir output-es && node packages/yoga-om-strom/run-minibench-node.mjs
scripts.minibench:bun: cd ../.. && ./node_modules/.bin/spago build -p yoga-om-strom --ensure-ranges && ./node_modules/.bin/purs-backend-es build --output-dir output-es && bun packages/yoga-om-strom/run-minibench-bun.mjs
scripts.minibench:deno: cd ../.. && ./node_modules/.bin/spago build -p yoga-om-strom --ensure-ranges && ./node_modules/.bin/purs-backend-es build --output-dir output-es && deno run --allow-all packages/yoga-om-strom/run-minibench-deno.mjs
